experience: You and Lance both know Bret Giles, Trish Bear, and 106 others

Matthew Pement and Lance Faulkner, CSM, CSPO both know this first hand.

Managing strategic SEO as well as creating long term SEO campaigns to drive bookings and revenue.
Onsite agency representative at Nike. Serve as the agency technical SEO lead, coordinating and shepherding business requirements with the various client technical teams.

Developed and implemented the optimization of all international web propertiesDeveloped and implemented mobile SEO strategy and process for domestic suite of Choice Hotels websites increasing mobile web presence from 200 pages indexed to over 6,000Performed extensive research on enterprise level SEO tools to improve team efficiency and increase revenue by an estimated 10%
